about_the_game:
Welcome to the Bushside Rangers Nature Park! Unfortunately, we're closed for the time being... come back soon?

Unravel the twisted secrets of the "Bushside Rangers Nature Park" as Vera, a young girl forced to use her wits as she's pursued by the tainted memories of the park's long lost innocence.

Bushside Rangers is an indie survival horror game which places you in the shoes of the reluctant Vera, a young girl who breaks into the abandoned "Bushside Rangers Nature Park" in an attempt to reminisce over it's abrupt closing years ago.

Unfortunately for her though, the time she spends in the park becomes longer and longer as she drifts towards the rabbit hole she's slowly but surely intertwining herself into. Throughout her visit to the nature-ridden park, she's forced to fend off against it's old mascots and other horrific foes. Even after years, they're still alive... and they're starving.

FEATURES

  • Full first person exploration around the "Bushside Rangers Nature Park", an abandoned nature park with lots of sights to see, and places to explore!

  • Horrific encounters with the park's mascots, once spectacles to behold but now reduced to nothing but monsters that sneak around, starving...

  • Immersive, real-time graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5

  • Collectables, scattered around the confines of the dark, desolate park are waiting to be found! Some are just for display, others give insight into what truly happened...

name: Bushside Rangers: Chapter 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More information will be added when Chapter 1 is close to release!
